Container.Name: iPXE-buildweb
Container.Overview: A web-based user interface that provide a way for the user to select any relevant iPXE build options, specify any embedded script, etc, and then construct and download the appropriate file. fork from chvb/Docker-Apache-PHP, works from xbgmsharp/ipxe-buildweb. based on phusion 0.9.18(ubuntu 14.04)

Config.Name: Logs
Config.Description: This location contains logs file from container. Container path: /logs

Config.Name: ipxe
Config.Description: This location contains logs file from container. Container path: /ipxe

Config.Name: ipxe-buildweb
Config.Description: This location contains logs file from container. Container path: /ipxe-buildweb

Config.Name: WEB Port
Config.Description: Port used to access the web interface.

Container.Description: A web-based user interface that provide a way for the user to select any relevant iPXE build options, specify any embedded script, etc, and then construct and download the appropriate file. fork from chvb/Docker-Apache-PHP, works from xbgmsharp/ipxe-buildweb. based on phusion 0.9.18(ubuntu 14.04)
